author: SooToday.com
title: Ground News - Andersson scores winner to help HC Davos to 4-3 win over Canada at Spengler Cup
text:
Summary by SooToday.com DAVOS, Switzerland — Calle Andersson scored with 3:45 left in regulation to lift HC Davos to a 4-3 win over Canada on Thursday at the Spengler Cup. The host team scored three unanswered goals in the third period. Share menu More
